channel.title: [PI] Removing the PvP instance in Lumbridge [PI]
channel.description: Umm, i dont get it. Please someone help me. How can i remove the PvP instance in Lumbridge? I only want PvP to be in the Wilderness :L

item.title: [PI] Removing the PvP instance in Lumbridge [PI]
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Okay. first of all

  1. Go to client.java
  2. Find IsInPVP
  3. Should look like this
    public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
    if ((coordY >= yyyy) && (coordY <= yyyy) && (coordX >= xxxx) && (coordX <= xxxx)) {
    return true;
    }
    return false;

Those coords are the ones in lumby. now delete the choords.
save and compile. should work.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Removing the PvP instance in Lumbridge [PI]
